title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations for scalability, security, and performance.

title: Data Modeling and Database Design
description: Design the data model and database schema to store and manage cyber activity data, including data sources, data types, data structures, and relationships. Consider scalability, performance, and security requirements.

title: Cybercrime Pattern Analysis and Prediction Algorithm Development
description: Develop the core AI algorithm for analyzing cyber activity patterns and predicting potential cybercrime incidents.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the CybercrimePredictor system, including data visualization and reporting components.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to relevant security standards and compliance regulations for handling sensitive cyber activity data.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure system quality and reliability.
dependencies: Cybercrime Pattern Analysis and Prediction Algorithm Development

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and monitoring systems for the CybercrimePredictor system.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for end-users and support staff.
dependencies: Cybercrime Pattern Analysis and Prediction Algorithm Development
